description: Erection of a single storey lower ground floor rear extension and installation of a door to lower ground floor side elevation. Installation of a rear solar panel.

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: CONARA CA5 : Stockwell Park Conservation Area

decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates must be begun no later than three years from the date of this decision notice.Reason: To comply with the provision of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990.

The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in complete accordance with the approved plans and drawings listed in this decision notice, other than where those details are altered pursuant to conditions of this planning permission. Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.

The brickwork of the rear extension hereby permitted shall match the original rear elevation in respect of the materials, colour, texture, profile and finished appearance, except where indicated otherwise on the drawings hereby approved or unless otherwise required by condition. Reason: To preserve the character and appearance of the local area. (Policies Q5, Q8 and Q11 of the Lambeth Local Plan (2021)).

The flat roof of the lower ground foor extension shall not be used as a roof terrace, sitting  out area or other amenity space.Reason:  To protect the amenities of adjoining occupiers and the area (policies Q2 and Q11 of the London Borough of Lambeth Local Plan (2021)).

Notwithstanding any indication given on the approved plans, the glazing to the extension and lantern light of the development hereby permitted shall be finished in timber framed or aluminium framed. The side door shall be timber framed appropriate for the age and style of the house.Reason:  To ensure that the external appearance of the building is satisfactory and that it protects or enhances the character and appearance of the Stockwell Park Conservation area  (policies Q2 and Q11 and Q22 of the London Borough of Lambeth Local Plan (2021)
